command: aws iam tag-user --user-name emma.j.taylor --tags Key=LinkedIn,Value='linkedin.com/in/emmajtaylor' Key=TimeZone,Value='PST' Key=Phone,Value='+1-206-555-0148'; aws iam list-user-tags --user-name emma.j.taylor --output json
explanation: Augments the persona with additional social and contact attributes, then lists tags to produce a structured record for automation and validation.
rationale_steps: Enrich persona metadata to enhance credibility (social link, timezone, phone).
Retrieve and log tags to ensure consistency across automation.
Maintain a realistic profile for long-term operations.
